CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: POBDTPD and PEBDTPD devices displayed reasonable open - circuit voltages ( V oc ) of 0.70 and 0.72 V , respectively , considering their HOMO levels , -5.23 and -5.37 eV , respectively.

Let's think step by step.
1. POBDTPD and PEBDTPD: These are the names of the devices mentioned in the paragraph. In this context, "POBDTPD" and "PEBDTPD" can be considered as the Material Names.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: POBDTPD and PEBDTPD devices displayed reasonable open - circuit voltages ( V oc ) of 0.70 and 0.72 V , respectively , considering their HOMO levels , -5.23 and -5.37 eV , respectively.

Let's think step by step.

1. POBDTPD and PEBDTPD: These are types of devices, specifically Organic Thin Film Transistors (TFTs) with POBDTPD (Positive Organic Thin Film Transistor with P-type doped drain and source) and PEBDTPD (Positive Organic Thin Film Transistor with P-type doped drain, Emitter, and Source) being identified.

2. V oc : This stands for Open-Circuit Voltage, a property of a device.

3. 0.70 V and 0.72 V: These are numerical values representing the open-circuit voltages of POBDTPD and PEBDTPD devices, respectively.

4. HOMO levels: These are energy levels, specifically the Highest Occupied Molecular Orbital levels, which are properties of the organic semiconductor materials used in the devices.

5. -5.23 eV and -5.37 eV: These are numerical values representing the HOMO levels of the organic semiconductor materials used in the POBDTPD and PEBDTPD devices, respectively.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. HOMO levels: These are energy levels, specifically the Highest Occupied Molecular Orbital levels, which are properties of the organic semiconductor materials.

2. -5.23 eV and -5.37 eV: These are numerical values representing the HOMO levels of the organic semiconductor materials.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| HOMO levels |
| -5.23 eV (POBDTPD) |
| -5.37 eV (PEBDTPD) |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: POBDTPD and PEBDTPD devices displayed reasonable open - circuit voltages ( V oc ) of 0.70 and 0.72 V , respectively , considering their HOMO levels , -5.23 and -5.37 eV , respectively.

Let's think step by step.

1. POBDTPD and PEBDTPD: These are types of devices, specifically Organic Thin Film Transistors (TFTs) with POBDTPD (Positive Organic Thin Film Transistor with P-type doped drain and source) and PEBDTPD (Positive Organic Thin Film Transistor with P-type doped drain, Emitter, and Source) being mentioned.

2. 0.70 V and 0.72 V: These are property values representing the open-circuit voltages (Voc) for POBDTPD and PEBDTPD devices, respectively.

3. -5.23 eV and -5.37 eV: These are property values representing the HOMO (Highest Occupied Molecular Orbital) levels for POBDTPD and PEBDTPD devices, respectively.

So, the property values in the paragraph are the open-circuit voltages (Voc) and HOMO levels for the POBDTPD and PEBDTPD devices.

2. 0.72 V (Voc for PEBDTPD)
3. -5.23 eV (HOMO level for POBDTPD)
4. -5.37 eV (HOMO level for PEBDTPD)
